author: Follke
title: Perfect location, great hotel
text:
It's been half a year since my visit, but the overall memory of this hotel is that everything worked as it should. The location near Buckingham Palace and Victoria station was pretty much as good as it gets. The lack of a restaurant didn't bother me and the pre-ordered breakfast to the room was fine and not overly priced.
The staff was the friendliest and most smiling I think I've ever seen in a hotel, and not in a fake-sort-of-way. They truly were welcoming.
The only "negative" that I can remember is that the bed was a tad too short for my tall nordic torso.
If the price remains as affordible compared to other hotels, I would have not problem recommending this hotel to others.
